item.title: Leetcode Array
item.description: Leetcode Array 目录 二分 收敛位置证明 leetcode35 二分 Template # 左闭右开 def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int: left, right = 0, len(nums) while left < right: mid = left + (right - left) // 2 if nums[mid] > target: right = mid elif nums[mid] < target: left = mid + 1 else: return mid return -1 # 左闭右闭 def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int: left , right = 0, len(nums) - 1 while left <= right: mid = left + (right - left) // 2 if nums[mid] > target: right = mid - 1 elif nums[mid] < target: left = mid + 1 else: return mid return -1 收敛位置证明 leetcode35 leetcode35.
